title: Obsolete ExternalProjectStarted(Finished)EventArgs
body:
We have `ExternalProjectStartedEventArgs` and `ExternalProjectFinishedEventArgs` that appear to be unused.

Consider obsoleting them.

nodes.body: I'm wondering if this is something a customer could extend to add custom logging.

But customers can't start or finish projects? Not sure what was the use case for these. Maybe there's a real use that I'm unaware of? I saw mentions of these in the TFS DistributedLogger, but I'm not sure those code paths were ever hit.
Certainly some archaeology is in order here.
